answers.answer: I'm sorry :( I know bed rest ***** it has to be worse with no help :( see if your Dr can RX you something to help in anyway.
I c my dr on monday and hes gettin an ear full lol. I was on bed rest with my daughter also not fun. I just want it to b all over.
I was only on bed rest with my first and I thought I was gonna die!
My 1st I was on super strick bed rest at 22wk. Now this on im just on bed rest but so far I been in bed since 24 wk im about to die

I broke bed rest cause my ex husband refused to work (hence ex along with other things lol) and well he didn't care about me or the baby enough to work for us so I did it and my son was born premature.
Yea thats kinda hard my boyfriend and I r still together just not livin together any more its really complicated. But I wish I could spend more time with him I might feel better about bein home.

question: So im sick of bein pregnant. Im 29 weeks on bed rest a 3 yr old at home. She tries so hard to help but half the time its annoyin. I have gestational diabetes. My back hurts my hips hurt my head hurts. My boyfriend doesnt live with me any more. Not by mines or his choice. so I only c him for about 5 mins a day now unless I have to b somewhere. I cant sleep so im very miserable. Im sorry I needed to really vent im so over this.
title: Pregnacy blues
